description: Statement for an account for a given billing cycle

available_credit_balance.description: The total available credit balance (in cents) for the account.

total_balance.description: The total balance (in cents) associated with the account.

account_id.description: The Canopy-generated ID for the account

effective_as_of_date.description: The `Date-Time` you would like the system to return the data as of. IE tell me what the account information was as if I had asked on `2020-10-20 00:00:00 EST`. If empty it defaults to current time.

min_pay_due_date.description: The `Date-Time` at which the minimum payment is due.

min_pay_amount_cents.description: The minimum amount (in cents) due for this statement.

billing_cycle_start_date.description: The inclusive starting `Date-Time` that defines which transations are part of this statement.

billing_cycle_end_date.description: The inclusive ending `Date-Time` that defines which transations are part of this statement.

account_id.description: The account associated with the line item

line_item_id.description: The ID associated with the line item

line_item_status.description: the corresponding Status for a line item

originating_amount_cents.description: The originating amount of money (in cents) relating to this line item.

balance_amount_cents.description: The current balance of the line item, which accounts for interest accrued per the `product's` interest policy and the `account's` interest rate attribute.

total_interest_accrued_cents.description: The sum (in cents) of all interest charges, if any, applied to this line item

total_paid_down_cents.description: The sum (in cents) of all payment splits, if any, applied to this line item

effective_at.description: The `Date-Time` that this account became/becomes active

created_at.description: The `Date-Time` which the account was created in the API

product_id.description: the Product ID of the account

description.description: A description of this particular line item if any. More common for adjustments.

reference_id.description: User ID in your system to associate with the payment for the account defined in Canopy.

dispute_id.description: The ID for a dispute if present for this line item.

external_ids.description: An array of static references to ID fields in a third party system.
